mapper.select: SELECT comment2_no, board2_no, comment2_content, comment2_regdate, comment2_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class FROM comment2 WHERE board2_no=${board2_no} AND comment2_isshow='Y' ORDER BY comment2_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment2(board2_no, comment2_content, comment2_regdate, comment2_isshow, member_id, member_name, member_class) VALUES(#{board2_no},#{comment2_content},now(),'Y',#{member_id},#{member_name},#{member_class})
mapper.update: UPDATE comment2 SET comment2_content=#{comment2_content} WHERE comment2_no=#{comment2_no}
UPDATE comment2 SET comment2_isshow='N' WHERE comment2_no = #{comment2_no}
